price: Mutum bã ya kõsãwa daga addu 'ar nẽman alhẽri kuma idan sharri ya shãfe shi, sai ya zama mai yanke kauna, Mai nũna kãsãwa.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
